title: With change in Wang Yi’s Nepal itinerary, speculation rife about his India visit - Hindustan Times
content: With change in Wang Yi’s Nepal itinerary, speculation rife about his India visit  Hindustan TimesView Full coverage on Google News
description: Nepal announced on Monday that Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi will visit the country during March 25-27, which was earlier expected to begin on March 26. It has triggered speculation about whether India will be part of his itinerary.
